data: Michael J. Murphy | Cappy Ricks | Matt Peasley

If you have read previous tales of the Blue Star Navigation Company and the various brisk individuals connected therewith, you will recall one Michael J. Murphy, who first came to the attention of Cappy Ricks at the time he, the said Murphy, was chief kicker of the barkentine Retriever under Captain Matt Peasley.

Cappy Ricks Retires: But That Doesn't Keep Him from Coming Back Stronger Than Ever
